## Description

A clear and concise description of what the feature is and why it would be valuable.

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution or how you envision the feature working.

## Use Case

Describe the use case or scenario where this feature would be helpful.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.
